data.description: Changed orphan repair strategy from 'delete' to 'adopt' to preserve git-tracked entity files that lack WAL entries. Files committed to git have no WAL records (WAL is gitignored), so they were incorrectly identified as crash orphans and deleted.

properties.description: Changed orphan repair strategy from 'delete' to 'adopt' to preserve git-tracked entity files that lack WAL entries. Files committed to git have no WAL records (WAL is gitignored), so they were incorrectly identified as crash orphans and deleted.
properties.retrospective: Verified fix in cortical/got/recovery.py:164 - orphan repair uses 'adopt' strategy to preserve git-tracked files.
properties.title: Fix recovery orphan repair deleting git-tracked entities

data.title: Fix recovery orphan repair deleting git-tracked entities
